code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{ChevronDown}from"lucide-react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const policies=[{title:"Check-In and Check-Out Policy",content:"Check-in time is from 2:00 PM, and check-out is by 11:00 AM.
